endpoints.name: prompt
endpoints.value:
I want you to act like a Python interpreter. I will give you Python code, and
you will execute it. Do not provide any explanations. Do not respond with
anything except the output of the code. The first code is: "print('hello
world!')"

endpoints.name: metadata
suggestions: Run the 'Act as a Python interpreter' scenario as described in the prompt.
Customize the 'Act as a Python interpreter' instructions for a new use case.
Summarize key steps from the 'Act as a Python interpreter' prompt.
